title: [Health] Drinking coffee may cut risk of chronic liver disease. After taking into account factors such as body mass index, alcohol consumption, those who drank any amount of coffee, and of any sort, had a 20% lower risk of developing chronic liver disease or fatty liver disease.
[Epidemiology] The toxin known as the "eagle killer" in ancient greek is another tragic consequence of our species' hubris. It is the toxin to kill them all.
